gesture_drag_distance: This function is used to set the distance it takes for a Dragging Gesture event to be triggered by the movement of a touch or click. The distance is measured in inches and has a default value of 0.1.
The distance (in inches) to set for drag gesture event detection.
The above code checks to see if the drag distance for gestures is set to 0.1 inches and if it is not it sets it to that value.
